Question: Katz Media Group CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Katz Media Group

Product Highlight: CES 2024

- Best Health Tech: Vivoo at Home UTI Diagnostic Test
- At-home UTI diagnostic test kit for women
- Deep learning image processing for result determination
- Vaginal pH test strips for proactive infection prevention

- Best Smart Home: Eureka Dual Washing Bot
- Combination of washer, dryer, robot vacuum, and robot mop
- Advanced AI dirt detection for efficient cleaning
- Robot mop's dirty water tank drains into the washing machine

- Best Camera: Abode Edge Camera
- Wi-Fi HaLow system for over a mile of wireless range
- Six-month battery life and object detection for packages, pets, and people
- Face recognition for identifying known visitors

- Best Transportation: Supernal S-A2
- eVTOL with pilot-plus-four-passenger capacity
- All-electric vehicle with max speeds of 120 mph and quiet operation
- Striking design honed using biomimicry based on bee shapes

- Best Outdoors: Milo Action Communicator
- Modern voice communication platform for small groups
- Palm-sized, hands-free device with a range of up to 5,000 feet
- All-day battery life, Bluetooth or wired headset options

- Best Weird: Looking Glass Go
- Compact 6-inch digital frame for holographic displays
- Ability to load spatial photos, 3D holograms, and chat with 3D characters
- Use of generative AI for 3D effect on 2D photos

- Best Parenting: Droyd Venym Electric Scooterboard
- Electric scooterboard for kids 4 and up
- Electric version of popular toy with dual motors and speed capped at 3 mph
- Stickers for personalization and safety

- Best Software: Apostrophy OS
- New mobile operating system based on GrapheneOS and Android
- Privacy-focused alternative with a built-in VPN and pre-installed apps
- App store based on the F-Droid open source app store and access to Google Play Store

- Best Mobile: Clicks
- Case adding a physical QWERTY keyboard to the iPhone
- Backlit keys and support for Mac and iPad keyboard shortcuts
- Available for iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro, and iPhone 15 Pro Max

- Best Home Theater: LG CineBeam Qube
- Compact 4K projector with 360-degree rotating handle
- 50-120 inch 4K images, 450,000:1 contrast ratio, and 500-lumen brightness
- Built-in 3-watt mono speaker and compatibility with streaming services

- Best PC: Lenovo ThinkBook Plus Gen 5 Hybrid
- Windows laptop with detachable display turning into an Android 13 tablet
- Unique 2-in-1 laptop design with a button to switch the operating system
- Expected cost around $2,000 and availability in the second quarter

- Best Accessory: Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro with DockKit
- MagSafe charger and 360-degree swiveling tripod for iPhone’s camera
- Works with Apple’s Works With DockKit program and supports swiveling for rear or selfie camera
- Plugged into the wall or run off a battery for around five hours

Note: The specifications and features are based on the products highlighted at CES 2024.
